name: Aelios Finance
description: corporate finance boutique for fast comp
tag_list: capital-raisind, fund-raising, ma, merger, acquisition, leverage, venture, vc
overview:
Aelios Finance is the leading French corporate finance advisory boutique helping entrepreneurs and fast companies to complete successful capital raising, mergers & acquisitions, LBO and IPO. Before creating Aelios Finance, all of its founders have all been entrepreneurs.

Aelios Finance’s team have successfully completed more than 150 transactions in the past 10 years, being so the undisputed leader in capital raising advisory for fast lane companies.

Aelios Finance is also the French office of the world’s largest network of independent corporate finance advisory firms, M&A International Inc. For further information: www.mergers.net
